name: River of Time
description:
Click and drag the rock outline to move it underneath the flow of particles. 

A concept demo for an interactive work featuring music, photography, and poem River of Time by Anishinaabe artist Craig Commanda. More of Craig's work, along with the full text of River of Time, can be found here:

https://montrealserai.com/article/multimedia-art-films-and-poetry/

Currently this demo build is only as far as this first scene. Please check out Craig's works for a continuation of this poem!
